name: The Tomb of Värvitu
description:
A challenging memory based puzzle made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

In the dark, mysterious tomb, you have one objective. Collect the treasure from each floor. How quickly can you move through the tomb's 40 floors?

The tomb itself has a slight twist: in the darkness, sight is limited! Memorise the path as you walk through towards the treasure, avoiding the traps and enemies, with the occasional help of your all-seeing eye.

Can you traverse the tomb the quickest or will you get lost before you can get Värvitu's treasure?

Version History:

  • 1.0a - Very minor error fix to allow completing Floor 9 without game crash
  • 1.0b - Very minor repair to Floor 15 to allow getting the sleeping moon
